body.name: Itzy Ritzy Sweetie Soother Silicone Orthodontic Pacifiers with Collapsible Handle & Two Air Holes for Added Safety, Set of 2 in Sky & Surf for Ages 0-6 Months
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 58 mins
features: This orthodontic pacifier 2-pack includes two coordinating pacifiers, each made of 100% food grade silicone and featuring 2 large vent holes for breathability
The soft, orthodontic nipple shape reduces pressure on the gumline and emerging teeth while soothing baby
Our pacifiers are safety tested to meet ASTM safety standards and feature a single-part design and a collapsible handle for added safety
Designed for ages 0 - 6 months; sold as a 2-piece set of coordinating sky and surf pacifiers
body.description: Help soothe your sweetie in style with these adorable pacifiers from Itzy Ritzy! The one-piece design of these orthodontic pacifiers is made of durable, latex-free silicone and each pacifier features a precious design accent on the handle to coordinate with baby's outfits. The soft, orthodontic nipple shape reduces pressure on the gumline and emerging teeth while soothing baby. Our pacifiers meet ASTM safety standards and include two large vent holes for breathability. If attaching a pacifier clip to a pacifier, we recommend securing it around the handle and not through the air hole for safety. Available in a two-pack including one sky and one surf, these pacifiers are ideal for babies aged 0 - 6 months and are free of PVC and BPA. Dishwasher safe on top rack only.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎Before 1st use, place in boiling water for 5 minutes. Allow to cool and squeeze any excess water from the nipple. Clean before each use with warm water and mild soap. Rinse with cold water. Dishwasher safe, top rack only.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sweetie Soothers are available in so many cute colors, who can choose just one?! About Our Brand Itzy Ritzy takes pride in offering stylish solutions to every day parenting challenges. Our product line includes diaper bags, breastfeeding scarves, reusable snack bags, shopping cart covers and much more. From multi-purpose designs that empower to chic prints that inspire, we've reinvented practical luxury for modern families around the world while remaining true to our core vision of keeping things simple. Itzy Ritzy Orthodontic Sweetie Soother Silicone Pacifiers - Set of 2 in Coordinating Colors Made of 100% Food Grade Silicone Help soothe your sweetie in style with these adorable orthodontic pacifiers from Itzy Ritzy! Their one-piece design is made of durable, latex-free silicone and each pacifier features a precious design accent on the handle to coordinate with baby's outfits. Their soft, orthodontic nipple shape reduces pressure on the gumline while soothing baby. Our pacifiers meet ASTM safety standards and include two large vent holes for breathability. Available in 0-6 months age range and 6-18 months age range. Orthodontic nipple shape minimizes pressure on emerging teeth Available in packs of 2 coordinating pacifiers Made of 100% food grade silicone BPA-free

So Many Features, All in a Little Pacifier! Orthodontic Nipple Shape The orthodontic nipple shape is soft, durable and reduces pressure on baby's gumline. Made of 100% Food Grade Silicone Our pacifiers are made of 100% food grade silicone and are BPA free. Features 2 Extra-Large Air Holes For Added Safety Each pacifier is made of a one-piece design and features two extra-large air holes for added safety. Every pacifier is tested to ASTM safety standards so you can feel confident giving it to your baby! Sold in Packs of Two Our Sweetie Soothers are sold in packs of two in coordinating colors, and each set features the same adorable design on the handle. Perfect for coordinating with your baby's outfits!
Available in Two Age Ranges Our orthodontic silicone pacifiers are sold in two age ranges: 0-6 months6-18 months
Dishwasher Safe! These pacifiers are dishwasher safe on the top rack only and are also microwave steam sterilizer bag safe.

Orthodontic 0-6 Months Orthodontic 6-18 Months Natural Rubber 0-6 Months Symmetrical Silicone Nipple Shape Orthodontic Orthodontic Cherry Symmetrical Nipple Material Silicone Silicone Natural Rubber Silicone Sold As 2-Pack ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s V Nice
reviews.reviewText: I like the quality of it, the colors are very nice too! My baby didn’t like it, but he hasn’t liked any other types either, he’s not a pacifier type of guy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: My lil one started loving this pacifier shape and I’m happy because it’s also orthodontic. The brand Itzy ritzy is also amazing I have several items from them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best pacifiers!
reviews.reviewText: My baby loves them! They're the best

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Well my child did not like this kind, but they are so cute I was hoping he did but he didn’t ..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars overpriced and large
reviews.reviewText: Very large and overpriced pacifier. Baby did not take to it. seemed too big for their face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars My baby didn’t like how curved the nipple was
reviews.reviewText: My baby didn’t like how curved the nipple was

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Baby doesn’t like it
reviews.reviewText: My baby has been using the newborn or original looking itzy ritzy pacifiers and absolutely loves it! I have bought atleast 10 of them in the last 15 months. I thought to try these since he’s older and first try spits it out. He refuses to take this pacifier! This might be a good idea to use when weaning him off 🧐

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hard to find something I don't like about it
reviews.reviewText: Things I like:- Easy to clean- Sturdy material, but flexible for baby to play with- Orthodontic shape- One piece, not worried about parts breaking into baby's mouth- Baby likes to use both ends, one as a paci and one as a teetherThings I don't like:- Hair sticks to material easily
Love these! My little guy does as well. Has an easier time keeping them in compared to others.

reviews.reviewTitle: The pacifier that every baby should have
reviews.reviewText: It's highly recommended that this shape pacifier is used to avoid deformed growth of baby jaw and teeth.This item is perfect.
I was super excited to try these they say 0-6m so I figured they would be smaller but they really aren’t smaller than the other pacifiers they sell and my baby hates them.
